body:
Do you want NBA Power Rankings from a professional sports betting model?

Then you're in the right place.

Far more accurate than any NBA journo or content marketing kid, these NBA Power Rankings are created by a market beating Model. 

You won't see it get carried away by a few good games or some lucky momentum. It's emotionless and objective. 

We'll update the NBA Power Rankings every week.
